[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1481531807636{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Roofing” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]Nothing enhances your home’s aesthetic value like a beautiful, well-maintained roof. It’s usually the first thing that people notice when they look at your home. Besides improving curb appeal, a solid roof can also insulate your home, protect it from seasonal elements, and provide structural support.

At United Home Services, we know the value of quality roofing more than anyone else. It’s why we are committed to providing high-quality, reliable roofing solutions at competitive rates. Our comprehensive roofing services include:

  •       Roof installation
  •       Roof repair
  •       Roof inspection
  •       Roof maintenance
  •       Roof replacement

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”16651″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Roof Installation” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Installing a new roof is a task that requires a great deal of expertise, training, and experience. Even the smallest of mistakes can lead to major problems over time, resulting in costly repairs.

At United Home Services, we have a highly skilled and well trained roofing services team which has decades of collective experience. We can install a wide range of roofs – from gable roofs to mansard roofs, gambrel roofs, hip roofs, flat roofs, and more. Similarly, we can handle different types of roofing materials as well – from asphalt shingles to wood, metal, clay, slate, and many more.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” gap=”5″ full_height=”yes” columns_placement=”top” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top” parallax=”content-moving” parallax_image=”16757″ css=”.vc_custom_1631560541355{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”How Our Roof Installation Process Works” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:57px|text_align:center|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”bounceInDown”][vc_column_text]

With United Home Services, getting a new roof installed is as easy as 1-2-3.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top” gap=”10″][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1631559979466{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.57) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUpBig”]

1

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Call our roofing services team for a free inspection. We will visit your place, determine what kind of roof would be best suited for your house, and give you an estimate.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Schedule Today” style=”custom” custom_background=”#81d742″ custom_text=”#ffffff” size=”lg” align=”center” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-calendar-alt” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fushometownservices.com%2F%23contact|||”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1631559972097{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.57) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUpBig”]

2

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Tell us your preferences in terms of roofing material, roofing style, and other features. If you have a hard time deciding what kind of roof would be perfect for your home, we can tell you about the upsides and downsides of each material and each type of roof and help you make an informed decision.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Schedule Today” style=”custom” custom_background=”#81d742″ custom_text=”#ffffff” size=”lg” align=”center” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-calendar-alt” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fushometownservices.com%2F%23contact|||”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1631559960631{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.57) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUpBig”]

3

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Go through the estimate, talk to your family, and then give us a call and schedule your roof installation at your convenience. We will visit your place, install the roof, and clean up your place to make sure it is free of roofing nails, metal shavings, and other such debris.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Schedule Today” style=”custom” custom_background=”#81d742″ custom_text=”#ffffff” size=”lg” align=”center” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-calendar-alt” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fushometownservices.com%2F%23contact|||”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Roof Repair” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]We know the roof is one of the most critical structural elements of your home, and we have acquired advanced expertise over the years to fix virtually any roofing damage. The roofing services team at United Home Services is trained and equipped to handle all kinds of roof repairs. We will inspect your roof carefully, find out what is causing the problem, discuss with you what needs to be done, and resolve the trouble as quickly as possible. 

The most common types of damage that our roof repair specialists can fix include:

  •       Storm damage
  •       Hail damage
  •       Damage caused by untrimmed tree branches
  •       Gutter backup
  •       Damage caused by shoddy installation
  •       Damage caused by wear and tear

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Emergency Roof Repair” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]In addition to scheduled roof repair services, we also offer emergency roof repair services on a 24/7 basis. If there is a problem with your roof which is serious in nature and needs to be fixed right away, give us a call and we will be there as soon as we can – whether it is day or night, rain or shine.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Roof Inspection and Maintenance” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]The best way to prevent roof problems and extend your roof’s lifespan is to have it inspected by the qualified professionals at United Home Services. We can inspect your roof at regular intervals, look for minor issues that could lead to costly repairs and fix them at the earliest, and make sure your roof stays in top-notch condition.

If your roof is newly installed, it is a good idea to schedule an inspection at least once a year. If it is older, it is advisable to schedule at least two inspections a year – in spring and fall preferably. Apart from this, it’s paramount to get your roof inspected by our roofing services team after a hurricane, hailstorm, and other such natural disasters.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
